mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.code FROM sys_permission p INNER JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT p.id, p.name, p.code, p.type, p.parent_id, /* 关键逻辑: 如果在 sys_role_permission 表中能找到记录，则 is_checked 为 1, 否则为 0 */ CASE WHEN rp.role_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_checked FROM sys_permission p LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id AND rp.role_id = #{roleId}
